description:
Hello! Apparently, our first choice of location was not very appealing and we received requests to move it to the city centre. We have a new location and we do hope this time you guys could make it. For this first meet-up, we will be discussing an all-time favourite Strange Case of Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde by Robert Louis Stevenson. 

For the succeeding meet-ups, we will ask recommendations from you and will open a poll for us to vote on our next book. 

Thank you for joining the meet-up group! :)
name: Ist book club meeting

description:
Hello, it is time to schedule October's meeting. The location has not yet been finalized but certainly it will be in Ixelles. And for the book of the month, kindly vote under the poll section. (More>Poll - this option is not available on the meet up app and can only be accessed via the website) We are open to suggestions on which books to read for the next months, please feel free to drop us a message. :)

How to access Poll with your smartphone: Open the Meet-up page in your smartphone's browser and click the "desktop version", you can find the More>Polls.

Book for October meeting - Katherine Boo - Behind the Beautiful Forevers: Life, Death, and Hope in a Mumbai Undercity
name: October book club meeting

description:
Update: 

Book for the month: Paul Auster - Leviathan

----------------------------------

Please vote for the book for this month under the poll section. The books were nominated by Oliver. Drop us a line if you would like to nominate books for the next meet-up :)

TO ACCESS POLL: 

More>Poll - this option is not available on the meet up app and can only be accessed via the website) 

How to access <Poll> with your smartphone (not the app): Open the Meet-up page in your smartphone's browser and click the "Desktop site", you can find the More>Polls.

Pls vote:

Oscar Wilde - Lady Windermere's Fan
Ernest Hemingway - For Whom the Bell Tolls
Paul Auster - Leviathan
name: November book club meeting

description:
Book of the month: 

Alias Grace - Margaret Atwood

------

Thank you Paula for providing the selection for this month!
